a:s.a:s: /* * Library: IMMZD2DTHepatitisB4OnTime (IMMZ.D2.DT.Hepatitis B.4 doses) * Rule: Determine if the client is due for a hepatitis B vaccination according to the national immunization schedule * Decision Table: 4-dose schedule (birth dose + 3 primary series doses), on-time start * Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any */ library IMMZD2DTHepatitisB4OnTime

def.name: Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Guidance

a:s.a:s: "Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 1"

'Should not vaccinate client for first Hepatitis B dose as client\'s age is not within appropriate age range. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first dose.'
"Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 2"

'Should not vaccinate client for second hepatitis B dose as the latest Hepatitis B dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the second dose.'
"Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 3"

'Should not vaccinate client for third hepatitis B dose as the latest Hepatitis B dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the third dose.'

when.name: Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 1

then.value: Should not vaccinate client for first Hepatitis B dose as client's age is not within appropriate age range. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first dose.

when.name: Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 2

then.value: Should not vaccinate client for second hepatitis B dose as the latest Hepatitis B dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the second dose.

when.name: Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 3

then.value: Should not vaccinate client for third hepatitis B dose as the latest Hepatitis B dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the third dose.
